Question: AdsWizz Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AdsWizz Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Publisher solutions for revenue optimization and advanced targeting
- In-stream insertion for any audio type, protocol, and player
- Campaign Manager for managing audio inventory
- Holistic platform for direct and programmatic sales
- Real-time attribution tools for measuring ad impact
- Marketplaces for podcasts and digital audio for ad inventory
- Advertiser solutions for personalized and impactful campaigns
- Audio-centric buying platform for accessing premium inventory
- AudioGO self-serve audio advertising platform
- Podcast solutions for scaling content and maximizing revenue
- Robust podcast streaming infrastructure and analytical tools
- Privacy-focused contextual solution for targeted ads
- Custom audience segments for multicultural engagement
- Safeguards against fraudulent domains and harmful content
- Scalable podcast solution with host-read advertising and audience targeting
- Podcast contextual targeting using speech-to-text transcription technology
Summary_cn:
AdsWizz公司

CES 2024产品亮点

- 出版商解决方案，用于收入优化和高级定位
- 适用于任何音频类型、协议和播放器的内嵌插入
- 用于管理音频库存的广告管理器
- 直接销售和程序化销售的综合平台
- 用于衡量广告影响的实时归因工具
- 用于广告库存的播客和数字音频市场
- 广告主解决方案，用于个性化和有影响力的广告活动
- 用于访问高级库存的音频中心购买平台
- AudioGO自助音频广告平台
- 扩展内容和最大化收入的播客解决方案
- 强大的播客流媒体基础设施和分析工具
- 针对隐私的上下文解决方案，用于定向广告
- 针对多元文化参与的定制受众细分
- 防止欺诈域名和有害内容的保护措施
- 可扩展的播客解决方案，具有主持人读取式广告和受众定位
- 使用语音转文本技术的播客上下文定位目标
